resources.string:
You want more practical examples?
 1. Go back Home in this app
 2. To to any image list
 3. Scroll down to the bottom
 4. Load More will be fired. Check LogCat
\'Storage\' permission is needed to upload a photo in the app setting

This example demonstrates when you have to fire 'Opened Widget' and 'Widget Visible'.

 Be aware of the difference between 'Opened Widget' and 'Widget Visible'.

 'Opened Widget': You should fire this when firing the api is done and loading the photo data into your own view for the widget is complete.

 'Widget Visible': 'Opened Widget' should be fired first. Then, you can fire this when your own view for the widget started to be visible on the screen.
This demonstrates how Pixlee\'s widgets look when local DarkMode is turned ON or OFF
